title: Ivanti Avalanche SecureFilter Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to partially bypass authentication on affected installations of Ivanti Avalanche. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the SecureFilter class. The issue results from incorrect string matching when making an authorization decision. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to partially bypass authentication on the application.
addtionnal_details: Ivanti has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://forums.ivanti.com/s/article/Security-Advisory-Ivanti-Avalanche-6-4-7-Multiple-CVEs
timeline:

2025-01-19 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2025-01-19 - Advisory Updated
